text: @ScottGottliebMD @gtconway3d Why are they counting almost all deaths as COVID-19 deaths simply bcz they died while being a carrier of the virus?  If the virus didn’t cause their death, isn’t it LYING to put them on the count list of COVID-19 deaths?
